meanings.definition: The quality or state of being brown in color.
meanings.sent1: The brownnesses of the tree trunks blended perfectly with the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: I love the warm brownnesses of autumn leaves.
meanings.sent3: The brownnesses of the chocolate cake made it look like a giant mud pie!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the rich brownnesses of freshly brewed coffee.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of the desert with the swirling brownnesses of the sand dunes.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a brown hue.
meanings.sent1: The brownnesses of the wood gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: His hair had a natural brownnesses that suited him well.
meanings.sent3: The brownnesses of the teddy bear made it look like a real bear cub!
meanings.sent4: The old book had a comforting brownnesses that reminded her of childhood stories.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of the forest with the vibrant brownnesses of the tree trunks.
